body_html: Follow the instructions here under the section "Create the pip package and install". However, also pass in the flag "--config=cuda" as well as the current "-c opt" in order to build with CUDA. Remember to run the configure script before running the bazel build.
body_text: Follow the instructions here under the section "Create the pip package and install".  However, also pass in the flag "--config=cuda" as well as the current "-c opt" in order to build with CUDA.  Remember to run the configure script before running the bazel build.
body: Follow the instructions [here](http://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup.md) under the section "Create the pip package and install".  However, also pass in the flag "--config=cuda" as well as the current "-c opt" in order to build with CUDA.  Remember to run the configure script before running the bazel build.
